statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some House coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${8.00} per pound with some Tanzanian coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${12.00} per pound to create \displaystyle{80} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${10.25} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
